question: Express the note value of <image 1> with three dotted notes
description:
The first image (Image 1) shows a single eighth note with a dot after it. This represents a dotted eighth note.

The second image (Image 2) displays three eighth notes, each followed by a dot. These are three dotted eighth notes.

The third image (Image 3) shows three eighth notes, but only the first two have dots after them. The third note does not have a dot.

The fourth image (Image 4) presents three eighth notes, but only the first one has a dot after it. The other two do not have dots.

The fifth image (Image 5) depicts three eighth notes, but only the last two have dots after them. The first note does not have a dot.

The question asks to express the note value of the first image (a single dotted eighth note) using three dotted eighth notes. Therefore, the correct option is the one where all three eighth notes are dotted, which corresponds to Image 2.
